name: Dragon Court
summary: "Dragon Court" was a fantasy-themed browser RPG set in a medieval world, distinguished by its pixelated graphics and turn-based combat. Players started by choosing from distinct races and classes, each with unique abilities, navigating through a world of text descriptions and simple visuals. The game imposed a daily limit on turns, adding a strategic layer as players had to plan their actions carefully. Adventures involved battling a variety of creatures in dungeons, with each victory earning them resources and experience.
